bibl.title: Urnula faberrime cavata. Observations on a Vessel used in the Cult of Isis. (Beiträge zur Altertumskunde. 63.)
bibl.note: A spouted vessel, piece of liturgical equipment, called urnula by Apuleius (Met. XI, 11).
KNAUER Elfriede Regina, Urnula faberrime cavata. Observations on a Vessel used in the Cult of Isis. (Beiträge zur Altertumskunde. 63.)
Stuttgart - Leipzig, B.G. Teubner, 1995, 8°, iv-74 pp., 49 figg. ISBN 3-519-07612-8. DM 68.
